2. How I can know if today is holiday?

R: Usually, the don\'t change, but there\'s specific commemorations\n that are placed in a particular day\'s week and this kind change date,\n like Saint Friday or Naval Glory Day, celebrated on mondays.
R: You can consult in the filter with the exact date (year, month, day),\n if is holiday, is gonna be showed, else, it will not show any info.
R: The cronometer displays how much time in hours,\n minutes and seconds left to the nearest holiday day to the 12 am.

Esta solemnidad, que conmemora el nacimiento de Jesucristo en Belén, se celebra el 25 de diciembre en la Iglesia católica, en la Iglesia anglicana, en algunas comunidades protestantes y en la mayoría de las Iglesias ortodoxas.
